short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast and easy way to share your Amazon cart with everyone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One-click, shareable URL generator for your Amazon cart.

This extension removes the friction of having to manually copy individual product links and generates a unique url that you can share with anyone.

If you've ever wanted someone to purchase the items in your cart on your behalf or just want to publicly share the list with everyone, this extension solves that problem.
